actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-799.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5244) to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy for civilian research and development programs for fiscal years 1985, 1986, and 1987.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5244 (Department of Energy civilian research and development program funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5244) to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy for civilian research and development programs for fiscal years 1985, 1986, and 1987.
